questions.question_text: What is a key benefit of CloudBlades?

choices.C: identification of port-based rules so they can be converted to application-based rules without compromising application availability
choices.B: utilization of near real-time analysis to detect previously unseen, targeted malware and advanced persistent threats
choices.A: automation of UI workflow without any code development and deployment of Prisma SD-WAN ION devices
choices.D: configuration of the authentication source once instead of for each authentication method used

questions.question_text: What is an advantage of the Palo Alto Networks cloud-based security infrastructure?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Agree with; It provides comprehensive, scalable cloud security with flexible licensing options.

choices.A: It provides comprehensive, scalable cloud security with flexible licensing options.
choices.C: It allows for the elimination of data centers within five years of implementation.
choices.B: It backhauls traffic to the corporate network.
choices.D: It increases the footprint of the security solution.

questions.question_text: What allows enforcement of policies based on business intent, enables dynamic path selection, and provides visibility into performance and availability for applications and networks?

discussion.content:

path selection --> ION, so C

choices.C: Complexity of connecting to a gateway is increased, providing additional protection.
choices.B: Connection to physical SD-WAN hubs in ther locations provides increased interconnectivity between branch offices.
choices.D: Virtual private network (VPN) services are used for remote access to the internal data center, but not the cloud.
choices.A: Users, devices, and apps are identified no matter where they connect from.

questions.question_text: What is a benefit of a cloud-based secure access service edge (SASE) infrastructure over a Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) product based on a software-defined perimeter (SDP) model?
